alert.note: Alert for Reno; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 07 at 7:58PM CDT until June 11 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Cow Creek near Hutchinson affecting Rice and Reno Counties. For the Cow Creek...including Lyons, Hutchinson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cow Creek near Hutchinson. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, The low water crossing on Wilson Rd between 69th Ave to 82nd Ave floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 7.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning to a crest of 10.1 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.5 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Cow Creek Hutchinso 9.5 7.3 Tue 7 pm CDT 9.2 10.0 9.4 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
